summary: I failed this test, so I'm going to fail all my tests
If someone doesn't agree with me, they must be against me
If I'm not the best, I'm a loserIf I'm late, my boss will think I'm unreliable and I'll get fired
I must be having a heart attack and I'm going to die
I'm going to fail this class and never graduate
I'm never going to lose weight and I'll always be overweight
If I'm late, my boss will think I'm unreliable and I'll get fired
My relationship is over and I'm going to be alone forever
I didn't get the job, so I'm never going to find a job that I like.
If I can't finish my workout routine today, I might as well not even try tomorrow
If I don't get an A on this assignment, I'll never be successful in this class.
If my partner doesn't always agree with me, then they don't really care about me
If I'm not the best at something, I might as well not even try at all
I failed my math test, so I'm terrible at all subjects
I had a bad experience with one therapist, so all therapy is useless
No one likes me because I'm always awkward in social situations
Every time I speak up in a meeting, I make a fool of myself.
All men/women are untrustworthy and will just break your heart.
